Text: Three years two designations one program that does it all for youPST marketinfographicsMockupagif marketinfographicsMockupagif marketinfographicsMockupagif marketinfographicsMockupagif marketinfographicsMockupagif Marrhew Platter MS CFA Three yearstwo designationsone program that does it all for you Now you can earn a Master of Science degree from the College for Financial Planning while preparing for your certification exams such as the CFA The new Financial Analyst concentration of the masters program adclickaspciid incorporates the Body of Knowledge developed by the Association of Investment Management and Research AIMR the organization that administers the CFA program You can earn masters level credit from an accredited institution pursuing the designation that is exploding in popularity the Chartered Financial Analyst CFA Each course is instructorled so that you can share in the knowledge of financial industry professionals Faculty are available online or by telephone to help you through difficult areas The courses in the Financial Analyst concentration are also offered separately adclickaspciid for professional development or to prepare for a specific examination topic This online program is flexible enough to meet the needs of your demanding schedule The distance education environment of the College allows you to balance your program with your work and family life so that you arent stuck with conflicting deadlines Contact the College for Financial Planning today for more information on this exciting program that will get your career moving forward Click here ciid for more information or call the Enrollment Center at option You have been sent this message because you are a current or former student of the College for Financial Planning If you wish to manage the kind of information the College for Financial Planning sends you via email please click on the following link SubscriptionManagementaspemailpplatteectEenronEcom
